column3: Faculty of Engineering, Environment and Computing
column5: The MSc in Cyber Security aims to provide you with the knowledge and necessary skills in several core areas of cyber security. The course aims to provide a comprehensive and deep understanding of security principles, as well as the practical techniques used in solving security problems and addressing relevant issues.
column7: UK Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 10400 | 4000 (Work placement option additional fee)  International Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 16600 | 4000 (Work placement option additional fee)
